actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress concerning unclaimed bonds that are being kept by the Department of the Treasury for veterans.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Secretary of the Treasury direct the Commissioner of the Public Debt to make available to national veterans' organizations, for publication in their periodicals, a list of names and serial numbers of veterans who own unclaimed savings bonds that are being kept by the Department of the Treasury.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress concerning unclaimed bonds that are being kept by the Department of the Treasury for veterans.
